attributes.action: Keep SSI plant in Redcar open to save 1700 jobs
attributes.background: Teesside has been rocked by SSI mothballing the steel making plant in Redcar, Teesside. Raise awareness so 1700 people have a chance of gaining their livelihoods back.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it is not clear what action you would like the UK Government and/or Parliament to take.

You may wish to consider resubmitting this petition with a clear statement of the action you would like taken (for example mothballing the plant so it can be reopened late, take the plant into public ownership, provide a loan to the company on the condition the plant is kept open for a period of time).
